title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Minister of State at the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine) 
Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department agriculture food marine) order 2020

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Stiofán Nutty, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Stiofán Nutty, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to Pippa Hackett, Minister of State at the Department of 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine with effect from 7 September 2020.
text_norm: 2 stiofan nutty particular whose address deposited office department agriculture food marine appointed special adviser pippa hackett minister state department agriculture food marine effect 7 september 2020

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 3. Caroline Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Caroline Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to Pippa Hackett, Minister of State at the Department 
of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, with effect from 7 September 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [732] 3
